seo.title: Overgrown Mess to Clean Gravel Garden | Newquay Project
seo.description: See how we transformed an overgrown, high-maintenance garden in Newquay into a beautiful, no-maintenance gravel space that brings joy and pride to its owner.
seo.ogTitle: From Overgrown to Outstanding: Newquay Gravel Garden Transformation
seo.ogDescription: A year of neglect turned into a stunning, easy-care gravel garden. The homeowner loves it—and so do the neighbours!

hero.imageAlt: Image of the completed gravel garden.

paragraphs: This Newquay project was a complete transformation over just 2-3 days. The homeowner had struggled to keep on top of her garden for over a year, and every time she walked in the front door, she felt an overwhelming sense of sadness. She truly cared about her garden but couldn't physically manage it anymore.

bullets: Cleared a year's worth of overgrowth and weeds
Installed a beautiful, no-maintenance gravel garden with simple, clean lines
A garden the homeowner absolutely loves and can enjoy without worry
Neighbours have been commenting on how good it looks as they walk past
A space that brings pride and relief instead of stress

faq.question: Why choose a gravel garden for low maintenance?
faq.answer: Gravel gardens require minimal upkeep, suppress weeds, and provide a clean, modern look. They’re perfect for anyone who wants a beautiful space without the stress of constant gardening.

faq.question: How long did the transformation take?
faq.answer: The entire project was completed in just 2-3 days, including clearing, preparation, and installation.

faq.answer: Absolutely! We specialise in low-maintenance transformations tailored to your needs. Get in touch for a free quote.
